results.t: What is React Fiber and How it Helps Build High-Performing ...
results.p: Fiber is a rewrite of one of React's core algorithms: the reconciler. The purpose of this algorithm is to take two DOM trees, compare the two ...

results.t: Building High-Performance Applications with React Fiber
results.p: React Fiber is an ongoing reimplementation of React's core algorithm. It is the culmination of over two years of research by the React team.
